title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. A, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 102 - Reimbursement Of Traveling Expenses In Connection With Performance Of Judicial Duties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. A, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 102 - Reimbursement Of Traveling Expenses In Connection With Performance Of Judicial Duties

State Regulations
§ 102.0 - General
§ 102.1 - Transportation expenses
§ 102.2 - Meals, lodging and incidental expenses
§ 102.3 - Reserved
§ 102.4 - Preparation and submission of expense vouchers
§ 102.5 - Change of residence or chambers
§ 102.6 - Reimbursement for intracounty travel

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. A, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 102

Statutory authority: Constitution, art. VI, §§ 20[b]-[c], 28[b]; L. 1987, ch. 263

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
